__TOC__

=== recap ===

Brian N(hal14450) and Joe A(deejoe), NY State Ubuntu LoCo Members, gave a presentation on Open Street Map at the monthly meeting of the Rochester Computer Society Incorporated (RCSI). Both Joe and Brian presented to the group using their Ubuntu laptops. This provided many Windows users with a good example of how usable Ubuntu is.
